meanings.definition: A spiral or scroll-like ornament, such as on a column.
meanings.sent1: The ancient column was adorned with intricate volutes.
meanings.sent2: The architect added volutes to the design of the building.
meanings.sent3: The volutes on the column seemed to dance in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her hair cascaded down her back in volutes, resembling the ornament on the column.
meanings.sent5: The artist meticulously carved the volutes into the marble, creating a stunning effect.

meanings.definition: A spiral shell of a mollusk.
meanings.sent1: She collected various volutes from the beach during her vacation.
meanings.sent2: The volutes found on the shore were beautifully patterned.
meanings.sent3: The child marveled at the intricate patterns on the volutes she found.
meanings.sent4: The volutes in the tide pools glistened in the sunlight like precious gems.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the growth patterns of the volutes to understand their habitat better.

meanings.sent1: The dancer moved gracefully, her arms forming elegant volutes in the air.
meanings.sent2: The storm clouds above twisted into dark volutes before the rain began.
meanings.sent3: The pastry chef expertly crafted volutes of chocolate on top of the cake.
meanings.sent4: The river meandered through the valley in gentle volutes.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted vibrant volutes of color on the canvas, creating a mesmerizing piece.
